news.content: Gave a talk on "Tackling Malicious Activity Online" at the University of Iowa
I was awarded "Rising Star in Social Computing and Tech Policy" by University of Iowa
Our paper "Sliding into My DMs: Detecting Uncomfortable or Unsafe Sexual Risk Experiences within Instagram Direct Messages." received the Impact Recognition award!
I got selected for the SIGCHI Gary Marsden Travel Award.
I received Research PhD. Fellowship Finalist Award at Meta.
Our papers titled "Getting Meta" and "Sliding into My DMs" got accepted at CSCW'23. Two papers yaayy!!
My Paper "Understanding the Digital Lives of Youth" got the Honorable Mention Award at CHI'22'!!
Our paper titled "Understanding the Digital Lives of Youth" got accepted at CHI'22!
